org.lainsoft.forge.flow.nav

Class GenericAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lainsoft.forge.flow.nav.GenericAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RubyControllerLoader

    public abstract class GenericAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    Interface that represents an action responding a requested stimulus. It must be implemented to create an accion.
